name: Sudoku In Pieces
description:
Sudoku in Pieces was the result of an assignment given to my team and I in a game prototyping class I took in 2015. In the game, you are presented with a broken sudoku puzzle that you must put back together like a jigsaw puzzle. Very calming, but colorful. I don't believe I have the final build of the game, but this is the last known good build that I have.
